bug.author: muupan
bug.summary: ABC's info returned by env.step is None
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainerrl/blob/master/chainerrl/envs/abc.py#L96>https://github.com/chainer/chainerrl/blob/master/chainerrl/envs/abc.py#L96</denchmark-link>
It should be dict instead according to the docstring of gym.Env. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openai/gym/blob/master/gym/core.py#L94>https://github.com/openai/gym/blob/master/gym/core.py#L94</denchmark-link>
